mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_dc (dc_cd, prod_cls_cd, dc_type, dc_name, dc_tar, dc_rt, dc_price, useYn, del_yn, dc_start, dc_last, remark, fstReg, fstRegr, lastUpd, lastUpdr) VALUES (#{dcCd}, #{prodClsCd}, #{dcType}, #{dcname}, #{dcTar}, #{dcRt}, #{dcPrice}, #{useYn}, #{delYn}, #{dcStart}, #{dcLast}, #{remark}, #{fstReg}, #{fstRegr}, #{lastUpd}, #{lastUpdr})
